_header: Harkeneth what Saint Luke will say / In our gospel of today
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4681.
_description: Gospel for Fourth Sunday after Trinity, in Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Lythis now what saynte luke will saieIn oure gospell of to
                    daie…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat for nede oft lithis er doneAls i sall be a tale
                    schewe sone
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herke what seint luc wol vs sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And for neode beo þei don as weMay here beo a take i
                    se
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
HErkenes what Seynt Luk wille sayIn oure godspelle of þis
                    day…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ȝit are þei done for nede may beAls ȝe be
                    þis tale may se
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiija post trinitate secundum Lucam (p.
                    232)

CULDd11.First Lines:
Herkene what seynt Luke wile vs sayIn oure Gospel of þis
                    dayI rede ȝe here with al ȝoure wil…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& for nede be þei don as wemay here be a litil tale
                    se
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 4a post festum sancte Trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        Lucam. Estote misericordes sicut & pater vester celestis misericors est
                        & ce (f. 149v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Herkens what luke wyll sayIn our gospell of to
                    day…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…þat for nede oft sythes er doneAls by a tale ȝe
                    sall here sone
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell of þe sonunday ferthe (f.
                    97v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
HErkeneþ what seint luc wol vs sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And for nede beo þei done as weMay here bi a tale
                    Ise

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Leres now what saint luke will sayIn our gospell of to
                    day…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That for ned oft sithis er doneAls I sall be a tale schewe
                    sone

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Herkyns what sant luke wyll sayIn oure gospell of to dayI rede
                    ȝe do with all ȝoure maghte…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and fore nede ere þei don als weMay be a lytyll tale
                    here se
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica quarta post festum sancte trinitatis Secundum Lucam (f.
                        107v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Herkenyth what seint Luc will sayIn oure gospell of to day I
                    rede þat ȝe do with all ȝoure maghtAs crist to his disciplis
                    taght…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And for nede bet þay done as weby a tale here may now
                    se
